name: Chemistry Kombat lll
description:
Learning science has never been so easy! Chemistry Kombat III - is a perfect blend of education & game, with a vast question bank covering over 300 concepts. It caters to CBSE curriculum of 10th class Chemistry. Detailed analysis of performance, voice guided crisp notes ensures conceptual clarity of kids. Play Chemistry Kombat III to clear your fundamental concepts.

Conquer the world with your skills! Get a chance to be a part of the Super Brain Club! Speed and accuracy will help you lead the game! The faster you workout, the more rewards, scholarship & money you earn. Liberty to learn concepts at your convenience! After playing this game, you will never go back to conventional online test. Learn Chemistry in a gamified way and also earn rewards for the same.

Topics
Chemical Reactions & Equations
Acids, Bases and Salts
Metals and Non-metals
Carbon and its Compounds
Periodic Classification of Elements


Additional

- Tracker to keep tab of your weak concepts & improve
- Single player game with no number crunching required
